name: Zup! F
summary:
Minimal physical puzzle with explosions. The player's goal to keep the blue ball on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.

Zup! F - the Final game of the franchise

▪ 60 Levels
▪ Achievements
▪ New cubes
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Puzzle
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2019年12月11日
  • 开发: Quiet River
  • 发行: Quiet River
